projects.title: Digital Clock
projects.description: The digital clock is fun becasue it offers a developer the ability to flex some creativity. While this rendition is fairly simple, I like it because it was a practice in allowing the user to dynamically change the app.

projects.title: Compound Interest Calculator
projects.description: This calculator measures how much an investment is expected to grow within a given period. I like this project because it is something that anyone can use while also being fast. In the future I intend to add a graph function to the result as well as an export button.
